20101223163910.000|20101223163912.000|CC1|>> ON THE SCALE OF OILS, WHAT'S 
20101223163912.000|20101223163913.000|CC1|THE WORST OIL?                  
20101223163913.000|20101223163914.000|CC1|>> VEGETABLE OIL IS RIGHT UP    
20101223163914.000|20101223163915.000|CC1|THERE.                          
20101223163915.000|20101223163916.000|CC1|IT'S REALLY AN OVERLOOKED THING.
20101223163916.000|20101223163919.000|CC1|GO FOR CANOLA OIL WHEN YOU COOK,
20101223163919.000|20101223163920.000|CC1|AND WHENEVER YOU'RE DRESSING IT,
